attributes.action: Donald Triumph should be given a night hood.
attributes.background: Donald Triumph is a leader of a free world.  U.K should not appose him.  To bee shore we keep Americans on are side we should make him a night of Great Brian.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
